name: Brawl Humans
description:
Humans living in the ancient century are using their wisdom to obtain resources, and strong warriors are fighting for their homeland under the command of tribal leaders.
Unscrupulous tyrannosaurs, treacherous other races are fighting against us for survival, go warriors! Raise the weapons in your hands to defend the homeland without fear of any difficulties
If you win, you will have meat to eat; if you lose, you will die without a corpse! Fight for survival!
Gameplay and Features
Raise the weapon in your hand and swing it forward, hitting the opponent's deadly part to win
When the winner is not decided for a long time, the duel will be reset, and the two sides will fight in a new way
